function.name: riceCooker_start
function.description: This function is used to start the rice cooking process in a rice cooker with a specific mode.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to start cooking rice.

predefinedRiceCookerMode.description: The predefined mode to start cooking rice.
